lyrics:
3 contributorsso blu lyricsverse 1
you see me at the bottom tryna to get on top
you see me at the club tou know i used to rock
you see me cryin tears
lord make em stop
you see the sun shine but never on my block
you see im tryna to grow let me get ahead
you know im tryna to do what my mamma said
lord i need a change
lord feel my pain
lord find me one that aint bout this game

im tryna find a man
im tryna find a ring
im tryna find someone

im tryna help you stack

lord tell me you feel my pain
so blu so blu
so blu so blu
so blu so blu
so blu so blu
you might also likeverse 2
you see me hustling for every cent i got
you see i never sleep until i reach the top
you see i cant slow down because you know its real
you see i cant stop here i gotta make a mill
im finna be a woman that stands the test of time
aint afraid to say im finna blow ya mind
im finna be the one you trust more than your boys
im finna reach the level number one across the board
